title: God of War PC: PlayStation's Best Port Ever? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.12.22
description:
Andy has played God of War 2018's PC version and is ready to talk to Blessing about reviews, Stalker 2 getting delayed, Kirby and The Forgotten Land getting a release date, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:09:05 - Housekeeping
Gamescast is recording today and it’s our GAME OF THE YEAR episode! Tune in live on Patreon at 12:30 pm pt to catch the episode or watch it as it goes live for everyone tomorrow on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Black Jack, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:12:20 - God of War on PC Review Round Up
00:19:35 - BREAKING: Sony’s Firesprite takes over Twisted Metal, as Motorstorm director is hired - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:28:30 - Stalker 2 has been delayed to December - Andy Chalk @ PC Gamer
00:32:40 - Kirby and The Forgotten Lands is coming in March - Ash Parrish @ GiBiz
00:36:50 - Ad
00:40:10 - Xbox Series S and X hits 1m UK sales in strong December - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:46:40 - Sony Is Dealing With PlayStation 5 Shortage by Making More PS4s - Takashi Mochozuky & Debby Wu @ Bloomberg
00:53:00 - PlayStation has published the PSN top downloads of 2021 - Justin Massongill @ PS Blog
00:59:45 - Out today
01:01:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
